Weddings

Your wedding day is a 'Special Day', and we at The Petwood Hotel, recognise that this is one of the most important days in your life and that you want everything to be perfect.

Here at The Petwood Hotel we want you to be free to enjoy every minute of your day, secure in the knowledge that every attention to detail is being looked after by profesionals who care.

You will be guided by our team every step of the way, whilst allowing you to be in control of your wedding plans.

Our banqueting rooms can be transformed from a formal Wedding Breakfast layout to an atmospheric, informal party setting for your Evening Reception.

We welcome you and your family to come and view the facilities of the Hotel and Aqua Sante Spa and see for yourselves why we have earned a fine reputation as one of the best wedding venues in the area.

We do hope this information is helpful in the preparations for your day and we look forward to welcoming you and your guests to The Petwood Hotel.
